name: TheFighters_Mobile
description:
90s style Indie fighting game

The game contains

1- Chapters

2 - Online ( 3D )

In the Online mode, you are going to face a real person and fight them to get more and more ranks to open your mission and get EXP to build your own character and make him stronger, there are 5 Ranks in the game for each rank you are going to get EXP to build your ability,

for each win, you are going to get 2 points

if you lost the game, you are going to lose 2 points.
